Inherit

    -Self:SELF.parent:OBJECT

Public

    -Self:SELF.width:INTEGER
        Screen width.

Public

    -Self:SELF.height:INTEGER
        Screen height.

Public

    -Self:SELF.bits:INTEGER
        Screen color 16,24,32 bits.

Public

    -Self:SELF.title:STRING_CONSTANT
        Window title.

Public

    -Self:SELF.video_mode:STRING_CONSTANT
        Setted video mode.

Public

    -Self:SELF.fullscreen:BOOLEAN
        Is application in fullscreen mode.

Public

    -Self:SELF.showcursor:BOOLEAN
        Is the cursor displayed.

Public

    -Self:SELF.init_timer:BOOLEAN
        Timer has been initialized.

Public

    -Self:SELF.init_audio:BOOLEAN
        Audio has been initialized.

Public

    -Self:SELF.init_video:BOOLEAN
        Video has been initialized.

Public

    -Self:SELF.init_cdrom:BOOLEAN
        Cdrom has been initialized.

Public

    -Self:SELF.init_joystick:BOOLEAN
        Joystick has been initialized.

Public

    -Self:SELF.init_everything:BOOLEAN
        All above

Public

    -Self:SELF.init_no_parachute:BOOLEAN
        Prevents from catching fatal signals

Public

    -Self:SELF.init_event_thread:BOOLEAN
        Runs the event manager in a separated thread
